Lyric:
[by:Ezekiel_Chain]
[00:04.70]Just stop your crying
[00:06.59]It's a sign of the times
[00:10.92]Welcome to the final show
[00:14.92]Hope you're wearing your best clothes
[00:18.72]
[00:20.36]You can't bribe the door on your way to the sky
[00:26.43]You look pretty good down here
[00:30.68]But you ain't really good, no
[00:34.38]
[00:35.94]We never learn, we've been here before
[00:40.02]Why are we always stuck and running from
[00:43.15]The bullets,  oh the bullets?
[00:51.69]We never learn, we've been here before
[00:55.55]Why are we always stuck and running from
[00:58.59]The bullets, oh the bullets?
[01:04.98]

[01:13.77]We gotta get away from here

[01:23.14]Just stop your crying
[01:25.15]It'll be alright

[01:33.68]We gotta get away from here
[01:36.98]

[01:41.07]Have the time of your life

[01:49.16]And things are pretty good from here
[01:53.10]

[02:05.21]Somewhere far away from here
[02:08.88]

[02:39.39]
